Moms mera ek sawal hai jiska jawab meri friend ne mujhse maanga tha. Uski shaadi ko 3 saal ho gaye hain.uska 1 saal ka beta hai. Jab wo pregnant thi tab apne maayke aa gayi thi. Husband se7-8 month door thi. Fir jab husband aaya usse milne to uska behaviour change ho gaya tha. Uske paas nai jaata tha. Jab delivery hui uske baad bhi uske paas nai jaata tha. Fir jab wo saath rahne lage tab bhi usko chhuta nai tha. Jab bhi wo bolti thi ki wo use pyar kare to thak jaane ka bahana banakar taal deta tha.jab wo saath sote the to bhi wo uski taraf dhyan nai deta tha.isi baat pe jab dono ka jhagda hota to bhi uske paas hamesha bahaana ready rahta tha. Meri friend bahut pareshan hai kyuki uske paas iska koi jawab naj kyuki uske husband mein koi kami nai hai
